comments.body: Presence of [0] indicates there could be more than one, how does one specify that?
No, `self.dvs.config.uplinkPortgroup` is an array with only one entry. Is there a better way to access the only entry in an array?

The VMware documentation describes it as a list that can have multiple entries:
https://code.vmware.com/apis/358/vsphere#/doc/vim.DistributedVirtualSwitch.ConfigInfo.html#uplinkPortgroup
I never saw more than one uplink portgroup in the list during my testing. Anyway. More than one isn't supported with this module and I doubt there will be more than one needed.
If you see an existing array with more than one member perhaps it would be a good idea to fail the request?
